channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CASSANDRA-19183] Fix cqlshlib cython test
item.description:
This is failing on trunk and 5.0:

PermissionError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/.ccm'

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: It looks like CASSANDRA-19086 is the culprit here. Here is a successful run right after CASSANDRA-18960, the last circle change before 19086. And here is a successful run from the commit directly before CASSANDRA-19086. /cc jlewandowski Bereng

It reproduces even locally for me:

./cassandra-cqlsh-tests.sh

PermissionError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/.ccm'

Let me look into it a bit more...

Bisected to fe7997884d88df4cc595044abb84b823a1fa03df for INFRA-25202 cc mck

Local repro:

  • ant realclean
  • ant jar
  • cd pylib
  • ./cassandra-cqlsh-tests.sh
I believe the problem here is that DIST_DIR is undefined, as added by INFRA-25202.
Sorry I couldn't help more, I am onto sthg else atm
All good bereng, sorry I falsely blamed you and thanks for your help!
Indeed, undefined DIST_DIR was the main issue, it passes with that fixed here.
We could alternately replace DIST_DIR with BUILD_DIR, but adding it makes it closer to its sister script.

No blame game I would have looked if I hadn't been onto some serialization problem.

Your branch passes, tested locally and I also prefer making it closer to it's sister script. +1 AFAICT
